section.title: &PRODNAME; - Document Change History
section.para: This version of the document replaces and obsoletes all previous versions. Review the following table to learn about the most recent changes.

listitem.para: Updated “Get token by SAML assertion" code samples to correct spelling error and role value and description.
Revised “Role-based access control” sections to consolidate overview and role descriptions, and add cross-references to Knowledge Center articles.
Updated “Get token by SAML assertion" code samples to correct spelling error and role value and description.
Revised “Role-based access control” sections to consolidate overview and role descriptions, and add cross-references to Knowledge Center articles.
Added Endpoint template to glossary.
Updated “Add endpoint template call and examples to include tenantAlias, an optional parameter that can be used to concatenate a tenant id string pattern to an endpoint.
Updated “Impersonations” flow diagram to reflect current product behavior.
Updated sample in “Contract versions” section to reflect current API status for version 1.1 and 2.0.
Updated “Alternate Authentication Endpoints” section to remove the Legacy endpoint table that duplicated information in the Authentication endpoints table.
Removed obsolete API status section. Account status values are no longer managed through the Identity API, and the API status values are covered in the “Contract versions” section.
Removed outdated information about differences between US and UK time formats. The system time is in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) format.
Updated Maven build version from 1.12 to current version, 1.15.0.
Removed text about Control panel restriction on users created from API from the Admin - external developers guide.
Updated "Update User" title to "Update User information and password" so that readers can find change password example.
Removed duplicate AUTH param in Get and Delete Endpoint template operations.
Updated RAX-AUTH operation examples in “Secret Questions and Answers”,
Updated many RAX-AUTH operations to have consistent examples. Added Multifactor and Federation, internal-only.
Corrected json response in .
Added simple definitions to many operation parameter tables.
Mentioned that elements not being updated in Update user by userid “Update user” do not need to be included in request body.
Added some examples of what a service is, since you can filter on serviceId in “Role_Calls”.
Removed Category Role table from .
Added information about domain ID to .
Added error to Add user "user operation.
Updated samples to Racker token authentication in .
Corrected links to endpoint documentation “Additional Resources” .

revdescription.para: Added note that the GET Roles for user on tenant call works for internal users only.

listitem.para: RBAC: Changed account admin user to account owner and changed sub-accout to account user. Changed some occurrences of global to multi-product. Changed some links to the external doc instead of internal doc.
Added domain id to: .
Added domain id to: .
Added domain id to: .
Added domain id to: .
Fixed some erroneous examples.
Updated “Request/Response Types” to include warning about potential delays.
Updated Table 6, “Rackspace RBAC Roles” to be consistent with Knowledge Center articles.
Added visibility note to “Users”.
Corrected update json user request and response (“Users”)
Added Region calls (“Regions”)
Updated Add User to reflect default region (“Secret Questions and Answers”)
Updated Update User to reflect default region (“Users”) )
fixed broken link ()
Replaced "sub-user" with "account users" everywhere.
Added discussion of apparent role conflicts in rbac
Corrected json example for impersonate user API call.
Corrected json example for add endpoint to tenant.
Corrected URI path for “Secret Questions and Answers”.
Corrected credential listing (adding tenant ID to token) for .
Added .
Removed references to deprecated endpoint v1 “Authentication Endpoints”.

Including several API calls from KSCATALOG and KSADM Openstack APIs including: Delete Role; List Services; Add, Get, and Delete Service; List Endpoint Templates; Add, Get, and Delete Endpoint Templates; List Endpoints; Add, Get, and List Templates; Get Users with Role; Add, Update, and Delete Tenants; List Users for Tenant; Add Role to User for Tenant, Delete Role from User for Tenant.
Included/corrected other new or missing API calls including: Reset API Key; Revoke Token;Get User by Email.
Added
In Additional resources, repaired broken links.
In Endpoints, repaired broken links.
In Additional resources, added a link to the Rackspace Open Cloud Community.
In Service, expanded Update Capabilities to add request body.
In Policy, added call to get detailed policy content.
Added Policy.
Added documentation for Service API operations.
In Users, added resetting API key credentials, listing accessible domains, and listing domain endpoints.
In Domain, added getting a list of domains.
In Authentication tokens, added authentication as a Racker.
Added examples demonstrating different format of expires for US and UK endpoints in .
Improved introductory text for Secret Questions and Answers.
Repaired broken links to annotated sample response.
Expanded Secret Questions and Answers.
Added documentation for Regions.
Added documentation for Domains API operations that are used to establish administrative boundaries.
Repaired broken link from to Sample request and response.
Updated samples to show defaultRegion in Sample request and response and and .
Added information about defaultRegion for “GET user by name”, “GET user by id", and “Add user"
Updated “Service Types in the Service Catalog” and supporting examples to show rax:dnsas the service type for Cloud DNS.
Simplified references to the Cloud Control Panel, showing that all customers have access to the Cloud Control Panel at http://mycloud.rackspace.com/.
Renamed RAX-GA extension to RAX-AUTH.
Removed "BETA" designation.
Expanded explanation and examples in , showing use of tenant name and tenant ID as authentication credentials.
Expanded explanation and examples in , showing use of expire-in-seconds.
Updated illustration in Concepts.
Restructured and expanded Additional resources, adding links to Rackspace Knowledge Center and customer feedback site.
Added Statuses section listing all possible account statuses.
Added Endpoints, showing recommended and legacy authentication endpoints.
Updated Faults to show that the overLimit fault can occur with any request.
Standardized references to "user" and "customer", since it is possible to have a user, such as a Racker, who is not a customer.
Repaired broken link to Sample request and response.
Updated Service Types to provide link to publicly-available documentation on Cloud Databases.
Added details to Namespaces, describing new standards and defaults.
For "Update User" and "Delete User" operations, added suggestion to use “GET user by id” to confirm that the intended user will be changed.
Added Account users section; moved most of the details from the Account User glossary item into that section, along with additional details on account users' inheritance of groups from parents.
Added suggestion in Additional resrources to check wiki pages for additional operational information.
Added documentation for Limits, introducing rate limiting, and, describing rate limiting operations.
Corrected malformed cURL example in Quick Start. In the same section, added an introduction to API extensions.
Updated twenty code samples, primarily to demonstrate use of namespaces.
Added Namespaces section introducing the idea of namespaces and relating it to the idea of API extensions.
Updated List credentials operation and Account users to state that account users must authenticate with their passwords.
Added an annotated JSON example in Sample request and response. In the same section, updated the annotated XML example to show new service types.
Updated Service Types to show new service types.
Added examples of creating a user with a password in . In the same section, added information that an account can have up to 100 account users.
Added examples of changing a user's password in “Update user”.
Added information about account users (also known as sub-accounts), including an entry in Glossary.
Updated authentication endpoints to &ENDPOINT-US; (for US-based accounts) and &ENDPOINT-UK; (for UK-based accounts).

Added Sample request and response, focused on interpreting authentication responses. This section includes annotated examples relocated from the "Request/Response Types" section and adds details on service types and recommended workflow. In the same section, added a note suggesting service type as the primary value for locating a service.

Expanded the list of operations described in . In the same chapter, added contact info for obtaining a service account, added an illustration of the impersonation process, and added notes on functionality provided by extensions to the core Identity API.
Updated multiple examples to show cloudServersOpenStack (Nova) in addition to cloudServers in service catalog responses.
Improved XML and JSON examples in Validate Token response.
Initial release for API v2.0.
